org.supercsv.io
Class CsvBeanWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.supercsv.io.AbstractCsvWriter
      org.supercsv.io.CsvBeanWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICsvBeanWriter, ICsvWriter
public class CsvBeanWriter
extends AbstractCsvWriter
implements ICsvBeanWriter

This class capable of writing beans to a CSV file. Notice that the cell processors can also be useful when writing data. For example, they can help ensure that only numbers are written in numeric columns, that numbers are unique or the output does not contain certain characters or exceed specified string lengths.

Author:
Kasper B. Graversen

Constructor Detail

CsvBeanWriter

public CsvBeanWriter(Writer writer,
                     CsvPreference preference)
Create a CSV writer. Note that the writer provided in the argument will be wrapped in a BufferedWriter before accessed.

Parameters:
writer - Stream to write to
preference - defines separation character, end of line character, etc.
